homeTitle: Starting on a New Key: From Music to Coding
homeDescription: I am Olesia Kubska, a passionate Full Stack Developer dedicated to building and optimizing interactive, user-friendly, and feature-rich websites.
aboutDescription: I am a dedicated Junior Full Stack Developer with two years of focused experience in backend technologies and modern frameworks such as Node, React, Angular, and SQL. Having transitioned from a background in music and arts, I bring a unique blend of creativity and technical skills to my work in developing robust backend solutions and dynamic front-end interfaces. I am currently enrolled in English courses to improve my speaking skills, aiming to achieve a solid C1 level. While I currently have a basic A2 level of English, I am continuously working to improve my communication skills. I am actively seeking a full-time position where I can leverage my backend development skills and continue to grow within modern web technologies. Known for my relentless curiosity and commitment to continual learning, I am eager to deepen my expertise and contribute to innovative projects.
